description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Monster Katz are on the attack and your best defense is... water?! Good thing Monster Katz hate water, but you better make it last! Use dozens of water-powered defenses to fend off the monster hoard in 39 exciting levels across 3 unique maps. Play along to your own tunes or jam with our Monster mix!
